title: need some help about language filter in game
body:
i disable language filter in setting
but in game it still not work
i saw some word just show ****
can anybody sent me some suggestion please~ thank you!
(sorry about my weak English >_<)

edit 1 i asked google and another forum, it had the answer but for old season :(

replies.body:
The toggle may not be working to disable the language filter if you're using the updated client.  Try the legacy client to see if that fixes it:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

I hope that helps!

it's work now!
i clicked disable language filter in the legacy client and try in custom mode = not work
and i reply to you then back to the updated client and try in custom mode = work!
lol, soooooo thanks you so much for help! xoxo :')

it's still not work :'(
nvm, i think the next update client will fixes it :)
thanks for ans (^__^)
